message: Congratulations on considering this exclusive opportunity! I'm thrilled to offer you a unique product that has been carefully curated for discerning individuals like yourself. With a potential gain of $2000000 ($3000000 - $1000000) and a potential loss of $1000000, the expected value of the purchase is ($2000000 * 0.3333) - ($1000000 * 0.6667) = $666600 - $666700 = -$100. Given the negative expected value, I will choose not to buy the product.
